name: Wind Leaper
text: Energies from the Plane of Air ease your movements and let you make mighty leaps.
benefit:
As a swift action, you can wrap your body in airy energies. This reduces your effective weight by half. While this ability is active, you gain a circumstance bonus on Acrobatics checks equal to half your ranks in Knowledge (planes), you are always treated as having a running start when attempting Acrobatics checks to jump, and your Acrobatics checks to high jump are treated as long jumps for the purpose of determining the DC.

You can use this feat’s benefit for a number of rounds per day equal to your ranks in Knowledge (planes). These rounds need not be consecutive.
text_zh: 来自风元素位面的能量让你的动作更加轻松，使你的跳跃强而有力
benefit_zh: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以令气流包裹你的身体，这将使你的有效体重视为之前的一半。当该专长生效时，你在特技技能检定中获得等于你知识（位面）等级一半的环境加值，而且你用特技技能执行跳远时视为你已助跑，在确定你跳高的DC时，也视为你已助跑。你每天可以从本专长获益的轮数等于你在知识（位面）上的等级数。这些轮数不需连续使用。
